issue.title: Upgrading Geotools library
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

The version of Geotools used in the EasySDI Proxy servlet is 2.4.1.
This version is quite old (2008) and can't be retreive from a maven repository.

Now that the Proxy project is managed by Maven, upgrading to a more recent version would be interesting.

**Fixed versions :** Unplanned

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène
